import { AuthContext } from "contexts/AuthContext"; import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min"; export default function Login() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: '', password: '', }); const history = useHistory(); const { login } = useContext(AuthContext); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: value, })); }; const handleLogin = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Make an API call to the backend to authenticate the user and get the JWT token const response = await fetch('/api/login', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); if (response.ok) { const { token } = await response.json(); login(token); // Update the authentication state with the received token history.push('/admin/dashboard'); // Redirect to the dashboard after successful login } else { // Handle login error (e.g., show an error message) } } catch (error) { // Handle login error (e.g., show an error message) } }; return ( <>
